rules.natural: Either Dr. Smith discovers penicillin or the penicillin project is successful research.
Whenever the microbiology lab tests penicillin, then, provided that the penicillin project is not successful research, penicillin cures infection.
Under the condition that the hospital trial performs clinical tests on penicillin, then, if the penicillin project is not successful research, penicillin cures infection.
Given that the government grant funds the microbiology lab, the microbiology lab tests penicillin.
If the pharmaceutical company funds the hospital trial, then the hospital trial conducts clinical tests on penicillin.
Provided that penicillin is a safe medication, it is an effective treatment.
Under the condition that Dr. White publishes findings in the immunology journal, the penicillin project is successful research.
If the immunology study yields validated results, then it does not produce controversial results.
Whenever Dr. Gray submits a paper to Lancet, then, if the research team receives the Nobel Prize, the research team is award-winning.
If Dr. Gray presents at the WHO conference, then, provided that the research team receives the Nobel Prize, the research team is award-winning.
Under the condition that Lancet accepts Dr. Gray's publication, Dr. Gray submits a paper to Lancet.
Provided that the WHO conference invites Dr. Gray as a speaker, Dr. Gray presents at the WHO conference.
If the medical editor approves Dr. Gray, then Lancet accepts Dr. Gray's publication.
Either the medical editor approves Dr. Gray or the program committee selects Dr. Gray.
Either animal testing of penicillin occurs in the mice study or human trials of penicillin occur in phase III.
Provided that human trials of penicillin occur in phase III, then, if the penicillin project is not successful research, penicillin is an effective treatment.

Under the condition that Dr. Kelly oversees the penicillin research, then, if animal testing of penicillin occurs in the mice study, and provided that the penicillin project is not successful research, penicillin is an effective treatment.
If the ethics committee approves Dr. Kelly's protocol, then, whenever Dr. Kelly is the research director, Dr. Kelly oversees the penicillin research.
Provided that the penicillin study is valid research, Dr. Smith does not retract the medical journal.
If the FDA monitors Dr. Kelly's study, then, under the condition that Dr. Kelly is the research director, Dr. Kelly oversees the penicillin research.

Given that Dr. Lee is a research fellow, then, assuming that it is not the case that the penicillin project is not successful research implies penicillin is a safe medication, penicillin is a recalled drug.
Either the university patents the discovery of penicillin or a biotech firm licenses the technology for penicillin.
Provided that a biotech firm licenses the technology for penicillin, then, if Dr. Brown is the lead researcher, Dr. Lee is a research fellow.
Either penicillin achieves commercial success or, if the university patents the discovery of penicillin, penicillin is a breakthrough discovery.
If penicillin is a blockbuster drug, then it does not achieve commercial success.
Whenever Pfizer is a pharmaceutical company, Pfizer markets the drug penicillin.
Given that Pfizer markets the drug penicillin, penicillin is a blockbuster drug.
If Dr. Jones conducts the penicillin study, the penicillin study is valid research.

Either the WHO includes penicillin in clinical guidelines or the FDA grants regulatory approval for penicillin or, under the condition that penicillin has adverse effects, penicillin is a recalled drug.
If penicillin is the standard treatment for infection, the hospital follows a medical protocol for infection.
Either penicillin is the standard treatment for infection or the WHO does not include penicillin in clinical guidelines.

Whenever Dr. Adams is a senior scientist, then, if Dr. Brown is the lead researcher, and provided that not having the penicillin project as successful research implies penicillin is safe, penicillin is recalled as a drug.
Either Dr. Adams is a senior scientist or Dr. Baker is a junior researcher.
Whenever Dr. Baker is a junior researcher, Dr. Evans is a PhD student.

Given that Dr. Clark is a research assistant, then, if Dr. Brown is the lead researcher, and under the condition that not having the penicillin project as successful research implies penicillin is safe, penicillin is recalled as a drug.
Under the condition that Dr. Davis is a lab technician, Dr. Clark is a research assistant.
Provided that Dr. Evans is a PhD student, Dr. Foster is a research intern.
Whenever Dr. Wilson reviews the penicillin study, the penicillin study is valid research.
If Dr. Foster is a research intern, Dr. Davis is a lab technician.
Given that the ethics board approves Dr. Jones, Dr. Jones conducts the penicillin study.
Either the ethics board approves Dr. Jones or peer review certifies Dr. Wilson.
Under the condition that peer review certifies Dr. Wilson, Dr. Wilson reviews the penicillin study.
If it is not the case that Dr. Smith discovers penicillin implies Dr. Smith publishes in the medical journal, then Dr. Smith retracts the medical journal.
Provided that it is not the case that either the government grant funds the microbiology lab or the pharmaceutical company funds the hospital trial, the funding application is rejected.
If it is not the case that either the government grant funds the microbiology lab or the pharmaceutical company funds the hospital trial, then the funding application is not rejected.

Under the condition that it is not the case that Dr. Green is the principal investigator implies that if Dr. Brown is the lead researcher, and provided that not having the penicillin project as successful research implies penicillin is safe, penicillin is recalled as a drug, then Dr. Black is a dismissed researcher.

Whenever it is not the case that Dr. Green is the principal investigator implies that if Dr. Brown is the lead researcher, and given that it is not the case that the penicillin project is not successful research implies penicillin is a safe medication, penicillin is a recalled drug, then Dr. Black is not a dismissed researcher.
If it is not the case that Dr. White is an expert immunologist implies Dr. White publishes findings in the immunology journal, then the immunology study produces controversial results.
Provided that it is not the case that Dr. White is an expert immunologist implies Dr. White publishes findings in the immunology journal, the immunology study yields validated results.

Whenever it is not the case that either penicillin research is a major discovery or the government grant funds the microbiology lab or the pharmaceutical company funds the hospital trial, the research team receives the Nobel Prize.

Provided that it is not the case that either penicillin research is a major discovery or the government grant funds the microbiology lab or the pharmaceutical company funds the hospital trial, the research team is not award-winning.
If it is not the case that the program committee selects Dr. Gray implies the WHO conference invites Dr. Gray as a speaker, then Dr. Gray's submission is rejected.
Under the condition that it is not the case that the program committee selects Dr. Gray implies the WHO conference invites Dr. Gray as a speaker, Dr. Gray's submission is not rejected.
Whenever it is not the case that either the ethics committee approves Dr. Kelly's protocol or the FDA monitors Dr. Kelly's study, the penicillin research is suspended.
Provided that it is not the case that either the ethics committee approves Dr. Kelly's protocol or the FDA monitors Dr. Kelly's study, the penicillin research is not suspended.
Under the condition that it is not the case that the penicillin project is not successful research implies penicillin is a safe medication, penicillin has adverse effects.
Given that the penicillin project is not successful research, penicillin does not cure infection.
